title: Looking for a mid-grade red cobb portrait
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: Looking for a mid-grade red cobb portrait
posts.post_content: 3-6 grade would be great, please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have one, thanks!
Have both an SGC 4 Red and an PSA 4 Red. Looking to trade one of them for a bat off or green+cash from me. Willing to sell one of them outright at the right price.
